title: Opinion: We asked whether principal investigators have plans in place for how research can continue without them
description: Researchers must be mindful of unexpected events that may leave them incapacitated or unable to lead their research projects or labs.
content: Researchers must be mindful of unexpected events that may leave them incapacitated or unable to lead their research projects or labs.
